long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hides information on op.gg that can be considered "spoilers". Mainly created to be used in tandem with extensions that allow you to launch League of Legends' in-game VOD playback through op.gg, so that you can watch the playback without being spoiled.

The extension achieves a spoiler-free history through:
    - Removing all blue/red color-coding for victory/loss, and replacing it with a neutral grey
    - Blurring out the score (KDA) of the summoner
    - Removing ACE/MVP badges, since they also reveal whether the game was a victory
